::Shadow Wing::

"It's been a while.  But the computer should recognize me.  I wasn't gone 
that long." She walked along the path on the mountain side.
She hoped the computer remembered her signal.  She walked along smelling the 
air and hearing the sounds.  It felt great to be back with friends. "So, 
anything on your mind or just enjoying the scenery?"
They had a ways to go before they would reach the ark.


----original message----
From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 9:34pm
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars

(You started flying toward it, so I thought you were bringing it to
me. Wolves don't fly.)

well anyway, Lunarpine exits the pod, The green jungle of Tibet
nearly hypnotized him. The green was a surprisingly nice change from
what he was usedto. the myriad of smells told him he would eat well
here.

Lunarpine followed Shadow Wing toward the Ark.

"So how longs it been since your last visit?"He asked hoping they'd
remember her.He'd hate to be greeted by gunfire.
